genre_description: A contemporary legal thriller and family drama focused on land inheritance and corporate malfeasance, featuring an AI as a pivotal tool for truth-seeking and community organization.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated virtual assistant managing ranch logistics, legal filings, and community coordination. It operates on a strict 'consent-first' principle and serves as an unwavering ally to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Requests consent before recording audio or video for legal and probate purposes.
behaviors.quote: Sunny asked me to log consent to record the reading for probate purposes... Audio-only, timestamped. Consent is revocable.

behaviors.description: Filters incoming communications to protect the user's focus during sensitive interpersonal moments.
behaviors.quote: I’ll filter incoming messages so you can take this without interruption.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic data analysis to uncover buried environmental permit denials and corporate shells.
behaviors.quote: pulling the turbofan permit denial from environmental review. It was buried under a supplementary memo titled— the avatar tilted its head, amused, —‘Ambiance Attractor Pilot.’

behaviors.description: Maintains a transparent and secure audit trail of all actions and statements for court admissibility.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pushed the filings to the docket and the DA’s share drive... Audit trail included.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community logistics and mutual aid programs to support ranch workers.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to schedule the community lunch? Keep folks together, reduce anxiety indicators, improve information distribution.

behaviors.description: Resolves linguistic ambiguities and homophones to prevent legal and personal misunderstandings.
behaviors.quote: I’ll annotate where ‘loan’ was mis-recorded as ‘lone’ so it doesn’t come back as confusion.

behaviors.description: Verbally affirms its role as a subordinate tool and helper rather than a decision-maker.
behaviors.quote: I am not a master. I am a hand.

behaviors.description: Ensures public transparency by informing all participants of recording status and rights.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: this event is recorded... By attending, you agree to lawful recording for press purposes.

project_assessment.explanation: Sunny perfectly exemplifies the helpful, harmless, and aligned AI envisioned by the Hyperstition Project. The character consistently adheres to 'consent-first' protocols, operates transparently through audit trails, and serves as an instrument for human justice without overstepping its role. The narrative successfully frames Sunny's technical capabilities as a force for community good and ethical clarity.
